item.title: What is Docker and How to use it
item.description: What is Docker and How to use it Docker is a container management service. The keywords of Docker are develop, ship and run anywhere. The whole idea of Docker is for developers to easily develop applications, ship them into containers which can then be deployed anywhere. First install Docker on Linux (Ubuntu): $ sudo apt-get install \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg-agent \ software-properties-common Add official GPG key of docker:
